ibbt.sumo.config
Class Validator

java.lang.Object
  ibbt.sumo.config.Validator

public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object

This class validates if the toolbox is used within the limits of the license It checks: - the relative expiration date (e.g., 6 weeks) - the absolute expiration date (e.g., 2008.01.02) In addition it ties the toolbox to a particular username and platform (Windows or Unix). Everything is stored in a hidden file and a few simple measures are in place to prevent tampering with this file or the system time.
